jobDescription: Data Analyst: San Francisco, CA What youll doCollaborate with different teams across the org to understand our environment and proactively find opportunities to better the businessWork closely with your team to put together seemingly disparate pieces of data, build out the data warehouse and create interactive dashboardsEffectively communicate data methodology and results to a diverse set of stakeholders. Turn raw data that people dont know what to do with intoWrite queries, contribute to larger scale products/projects and perform ad hoc analyses as neededWhat were looking forExcel guru; you can get your hands dirty here we do not yet have the right scalable solution in placeSQL expert and general understanding of databases, relationships and data integrity2+ years experience with BI Tools such as Tableau and MicroStrategyData visualization best practicesStrong communication skills, attention to detail and team playerWillingness and desire to learn and grow both technical and non-technical in order to push the team and our customers to the next level2+ years experience in quantitative/analytic role, preferably within techRegards,Megha AnanthakrishnaTechnical Resource Manager |MatchPoint Solutions| Office 925-829-7755| Cell 408-718-6170| Email megha@matchps.com
